job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on leveraging AI tools for efficiency and enhancing existing products rather than developing core AI models or generative AI applications. It emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks like back-end development, code reviews, and integrating AI-driven solutions, but lacks specific details on building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models or advanced AI systems. The role appears to be more about using AI as a productivity enhancer within a software engineering context, aligning with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications' and 'Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards' directly relates to software development quality assurance and team collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement' indicates a need to understand business goals and translate them into technical strategies.
job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.' describes the application of tools within a software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
